title: Looking to buy N172 Old Judge Detroit
author: cobbcobb13

posts.post_title: Looking to buy N172 Old Judge Detroit
posts.post_content:
I am working on the collection of Detroit Wolverines. 
Willing to consider ungraded or graded from (nearly) any company :)
I picked up 2! Thank you everyone. I am still looking if anyone is selling.

Hello CobbCobb,

Two forum members have hunted Detroit OJs for many years, another several have collected them a bit more loosely.  There seem to be more Detroit OJ collectors than any other team and we sometimes knock each other out but it is all good.  Send me email, I may be able to help you out.  Would like to learn more about what you have collected and what your goals are for 19th century Detroits.

[url]detroitwolverines@gmail.com[/url]

Thank you Joe G
You’re a gentleman and a scholar. 

I picked up a couple more Detroit Wolverines, Still looking for 1887-89 old judge Detroit Wolverines in any condition
